pound.name: Pound
pound.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

karate_chop.name: Karate Chop
karate_chop.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

double_slap.name: Double Slap
double_slap.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

comet_punch.name: Comet Punch
comet_punch.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

mega_punch.name: Mega Punch
mega_punch.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

pay_day.name: Pay Day
pay_day.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
effects: earns money equal to twice the user's level

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

vice_grip.name: Vice Grip
vice_grip.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

razor_wind.name: Razor Wind
razor_wind.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

swords_dance.name: Swords Dance
swords_dance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

cut.name: Cut
cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

wing_attack.name: Wing Attack
wing_attack.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
effects: deals 1/16 max HP damage each turn

slam.name: Slam
slam.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

double_kick.name: Double Kick
double_kick.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

mega_kick.name: Mega Kick
mega_kick.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

jump_kick.name: Jump Kick
jump_kick.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.
effects: user takes recoil damage if move misses

rolling_kick.name: Rolling Kick
rolling_kick.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

sand_attack.name: Sand Attack
sand_attack.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

horn_attack.name: Horn Attack
horn_attack.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

fury_attack.name: Fury Attack
fury_attack.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

horn_drill.name: Horn Drill
horn_drill.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

body_slam.name: Body Slam
body_slam.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
effects: deals 1/16 max HP damage each turn

take_down.name: Take Down
take_down.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

double_edge.name: Double-Edge
double_edge.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

tail_whip.name: Tail Whip
tail_whip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

growl.name: Growl
growl.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out.

sing.name: Sing
sing.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

supersonic.name: Supersonic
supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

sonic_boom.name: Sonic Boom
sonic_boom.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
effects: disables target's last used move for 4 turns

quick_attack.name: Quick Attack
quick_attack.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
effects: Attack increases by 1 stage each time user is hit

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

screech.name: Screech
screech.description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

double_team.name: Double Team
double_team.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
effects: heals user by 50% of max HP

harden.name: Harden
harden.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

confuse_ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse_ray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

defense_curl.name: Defense Curl
defense_curl.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

light_screen.name: Light Screen
light_screen.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
effects: reduces special damage by 50% for 5 turns

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
effects: reduces physical damage by 50% for 5 turns

focus_energy.name: Focus Energy
focus_energy.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
effects: deals double stored damage on turn 3

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.
effects: randomly uses any move in the game

self_destruct.name: Self-Destruct
self_destruct.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

egg_bomb.name: Egg Bomb
egg_bomb.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

skull_bash.name: Skull Bash
skull_bash.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

spike_cannon.name: Spike Cannon
spike_cannon.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.
effects: 10% chance to lower Speed by 1 stage

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.
effects: raises user's Special Defense by 2 stages

soft_boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
soft_boiled.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
effects: heals user by 50% of max HP

high_jump_kick.name: High Jump Kick
high_jump_kick.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.
effects: user takes recoil damage if move misses

glare.name: Glare
glare.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

lovely_kiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovely_kiss.description: With a lovely, sweet kiss, the user makes the target fall into a deep slumber.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
effects: copies target's appearance, type, stats, and moves

dizzy_punch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzy_punch.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.
effects: creates substitute with 25% of user's max HP

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
